# Bar Theme CSS Animations

## Summary
Added atmospheric CSS animations to enhance the bar/casino theme aesthetic.

## Changes Made

### CSS Animations (index.css)
- **neon-flicker**: Classic bar sign flicker effect with intermittent dimming
- **neon-pulse**: Subtle glow pulsing for UI elements  
- **smoke-wisp**: Floating smoke particles rising from bottom
- **ambient-bar-glow**: Warm amber/orange radial gradients on screen edges

### App.tsx
- Added smoke wisp elements (3 instances with staggered timing)
- Added ambient bar glow overlay

### PlayerHand.tsx
- Turn indicator now shows "🎯 YOUR TURN" with neon-flicker when it's player's turn
- Falls back to "Your Hand (count)" with regular neon-text when not

### Lobby.tsx
- Selected avatar now has neon-pulse effect

## Technical Notes
- All effects use CSS animations (performant, GPU-accelerated)
- Smoke wisps are positioned fixed at bottom with different delays
- Ambient glow is very subtle to not distract from gameplay
- Neon flicker mimics real bar sign electrical issues

## Files Changed
- frontend/src/index.css
- frontend/src/App.tsx
- frontend/src/components/PlayerHand.tsx
- frontend/src/components/Lobby.tsx

## Related
- Part of theme overhaul (ann_010141_31ffb0)
- Previous work: gold leaf effect, bar-themed reactions
- Remaining: victory/defeat images, sound assets
